misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry. His dedication to the sport and competitive spirit have made him a formidable player in past events.
Over the years, Daniel has participated in 7 Hector Trophée tournaments. His efforts have been crowned by winning the Hector Trophée twice, a testament to his skill and perseverance in pair play.

While the Victor trophy has eluded him thus far, Daniel's consistent performance and strategic prowess make him a respected competitor. Although known to occasionally lose his temper on the course, Daniel is always a gentleman.

Although he is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, golf enthusiasts know that last-minute changes can always occur. We look forward to seeing whether Daniel will once again grace the fairways with his presence in the future.
